titles.title: See That You Build It, According To The Pattern

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
See that you build it, according to the pattern.
See that you build it, according to the pattern.
See that you build it, according to the pattern
That was shown on the Holy Mount of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou shalt be the glory, the glory of the Lord (3x)
That was shown on the Holy Mount of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord help us build it, according to the pattern (3x)
That was shown on the Holy Mount of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We shall be the standard, the standard of the Lord (3x)
That was shown on the Holy Mount of God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We shall be the Head, the Head of God's Church (3x)
That was shown on the Holy Mount of God.
